title: Super Galaxy Vi and Cait
body:
I was looking around for LOL wallpapers and found this on deviant art when I went to check out the artists work. It would be an interesting skin duo maybe 1350's?
All Credit to ippus on DeviantArt
EDIT: I just thought of Jinx being Viral
EDIT 2: When Vi charges her Q, it becomes a Drill

replies.body: Well, maybe if Caitlyn put on a shirt... I mean like wtf
Gragas doesn't even wear a shirt and nobody seems to care about that.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:17:16.003+0000)
>
> Gragas doesn't even wear a shirt and nobody seems to care about that.

Or real pants...
Man, if you think Gragas is bad, wait till you see Fizz.
Meanwhile Nami.

Also; meanwhile Rek'Sai.

At least she got a vest in her Pool Party skin. But the indecency otherwise. Gosh.
Yeah, Gragas is basically naked, has nobody noticed this before?
most of use subconsciously block it out because it's a tad bit too disturbing...
Meanwhile Varus and Zac

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=00020003,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:17:16.003+0000)
>
> Gragas doesn't even wear a shirt and nobody seems to care about that.

Sejuani wears a bikini and everyone loses their shit BC no bikinis in winter! Tryn and Braum go shirtless and everyone loses their shit BC MANLY MEN NEED NO CLOTHES
I care deeply about Gragas not wearing a shirt. I expect him to carry on doing so and never to deprive the world of his glorious masculinity.

Well I agree, A little much, BUT I also Understand the Source Material, Which is Gurren Lagann.
The Character Cait's Skin is based on is Yoko Littner, Who is dressed in Practiacally Nothing (Just enough to be considered SFW (I think)

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/dragonball/images/4/41/Yoko_5.png/revision/latest?cb=20130128022120

(Riot I'm pretty sure this NOT NAKED person counts as SFW but if It doesn't I apologise.)
Fun fact: Yoko is 14.

Not after the timeskip ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)!!

http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130619234205/halo/images/0/0e/USER_Yoko%281%29.png
Fun Fact: Her being 14 is meaningless in terms of whether or not she's attractive
If her age's not on the clock ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Military Time, all the way up to 24.

> [{quoted}](name=Madoka KanameSan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=0002000200000000,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:48:36.390+0000)
>
> Fun Fact: Her being 14 is meaningless in terms of whether or not she's attractive

"Now before any of you find this incredibly creepy, let me make one thing perfectly clear:
The age of consent in many parts of Japan is in fact. . . _Thirteen_ years old. . .
Now you may find it incredibly creepy." - Doug Walker
Time to move to Japan!

> [{quoted}](name=idoki,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:21:12.749+0000)
>
> Fun fact: Yoko is 14.

Disturbing, isn't it?

> [{quoted}](name=idoki,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=000200020000,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:21:12.749+0000)
>
> Fun fact: Yoko is 14.

"Yeah, forgot that for a second, didn't you. The girls in this show are and always have been fourteen years old.

_Fourteen years old. . . fourteen years old. . . fourtee-_ DAMN! Uh- _-years old. . ._" - Doug Walker

Man....this Caitlyn looks really cool.



I'd personally want to get a VU on Cait before attempting a skin like this though. Nothing kills the vibe more than a clunky and boring animation set especially for an anime-based skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:12:11.990+0000)
>
> Man....this Caitlyn looks really cool.
> 
> 
> 
> I'd personally want to get a VU on Cait before attempting a skin like this though. Nothing kills the vibe more than a clunky and boring animation set especially for an anime-based skin.

Holdin ya 2 dis
No promises or confirmations were made. Not sure what I'm being held to.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=000700020000,timestamp=2015-08-10T03:09:36.721+0000)
>
> No promises or confirmations were made. Not sure what I'm being held to.

(▀̿Ĺ̯▀̿ ̿) I'm watching you
Dude don't discourage riot from communicating on potential ideas, he's just considering it
riot wants to give her aa vu? dang : o hope it goes better then the {{champion:114}} one

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Whist,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-08-09T20:12:11.990+0000)

>

> 
> I'd personally want to get a VU on Cait before attempting a skin like this though. Nothing kills the vibe more than a clunky and boring animation set especially for an anime-based skin.

haha yes i would love the Vi skin tho!!!
MY HEXTECH GAUNTLET WILL BE THE HEXTECH GAUNTLET TO PIERCE THE HEAVENS!
When she ults: "This is the fist that will pierce the heavens!"
And this is that moment when I realize Yoko and Jinx have basically the same Outfit
i feel like the cait skin would be a huge nerf.  having to play one handed and all...
Cait fits the theme of Gurren Lagann but Vi doesn't... Need a manly long sword champion for that.

> [{quoted}](name=idoki,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-09T16:04:13.981+0000)
>
> Cait fits the theme of Gurren Lagann but Vi doesn't... Need a manly long sword champion for that.

Only champ with a sword that fits Kamina's sword..... is {{champion:157}}

> [{quoted}](name=BlackSunNocturne,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=00010004,timestamp=2015-08-09T18:28:39.506+0000)
>
> Only champ with a sword that fits Kamina's sword..... is {{champion:157}}

YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEES!!!

His whirlwind could look like a huge frickin' tornado/drill of spiral energy! Malzahar could be the Anti-Spiral (and we can rename him just to make sure there are no lawsuits).

If Yasuo gets a Super Galaxy skin, he better have the taunt of, "Just who the hell do you think I am?!"

And his abilities can have him scream outrageous things like Kamina does when he performs finishing moves and stuff.

Also, he can taunt or joke at an allied Super Galaxy Rumble saying, "Believe in the Yasuo who believes in you!" or something.

(but I might occasionally lose in the middle of teamfights because using a Kamina Yasuo would bring back the memory of Kamina dying and I still cry.)
I personally enjoy Vi's Manly Long Sword ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
you cant have a cait skin without vi xD
need super galaxie Yasuo

Yeah, they both are 100% Gurren Legann themed :| check Vi's sunglasses, the arm logo, the blue hair etc.

Both Gurren Legann :)
Is there no clothing in the super galaxy? I dont get how 'tiny bikini' = SUPER GALAXY? That is all

> [{quoted}](name=XxxLumberJackxxX,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u41pZQwi,comment-id=001a,timestamp=2015-08-10T14:06:22.096+0000)
>
> Is there no clothing in the super galaxy? I dont get how 'tiny bikini' = SUPER GALAXY? That is all

Cait is Yoko from Gurren Lagann, Yoko wears that clothing and has a really big sniper rifle.
That is a gurren lagen themed image.  I'd prefer Kill la Kill Leona.
YES
{{champion:53}} : "YES NOW I WANT TO GRAB THAT"
We do need more belly button!
Wouldn't Yasuo fit more in to this than Vi? Like I know their partners, but I think Yasuo would fit the place of Kamina better.
Have this print on my wall along with 10 other Ippus pieces. LOVE IT!
But no Jinx?
